question: A flow of funds takes place only if:
options: Transactions which involve only current accounts
Transactions which involve only non-current accounts
Transactions which involve one current account and one non-current account
answer: Transactions which involve one current account and one non-current account

question: Which of the following is a source of funds?
options: An increase in an asset over the year
A decrease in an asset over the year
A decrease in a liability over the year
answer: A decrease in an asset over the year

question: Which of the following is an application of funds?
options: An increase in an asset over the year
A decrease in an asset over the year
A increase in a liability over the year
answer: An increase in an asset over the year
